						                    Newly Diagnosed Childhood Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (Special Groups)
						                    T-cell childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia    The treatment of T-cell childhood acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL) during the remission induction, consolidation /intensification, and maintenance phases always includes combination chemotherapy. Children with T-c
